title: Transmuter

| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **[Difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | 25                                                                                                                                                                           |

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                                                                                                                                                                              |

| **[Base MR](/wiki/Magic_resistance_\(monster\) "Magic resistance (monster)")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | 30                                                                                                                                                                           |
| **[Alignment](/wiki/Alignment#Monster_alignment "Alignment")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | -20 (chaotic)                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                                                                                                                                                                              |

| **[Genocidable](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | No                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                                                                                                                                                                              |
| **[Weight](/wiki/Weight "Weight")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | 1450                                                                                                                                                                         |
| **[Nutritional value](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | 400                                                                                                                                                                          |
| **[Size](/wiki/Physical_size "Physical size")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | Medium                                                                                                                                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                                                                                                                                                                              |
| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | Death, fire, cold, shock, poison                                                                                                                                             |
| **Resistances [conveyed](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | Fire (25%), cold (25%), shock (25%), poison (25%)                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                                                                                                                                                                              |
| Transmuter:* can [see invisible creatures](/wiki/See_invisible "See invisible").
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* can [follow](/wiki/Follower "Follower") you to other levels.
* is [nasty](/wiki/M2_NASTY "M2 NASTY").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* [likes gold](/wiki/Gold_lover "Gold lover").
* likes gems.
* can pick up [magical items](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item").
* wants your [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact").
* hits creatures as a +4 weapon. |                                                                                                                                                                              |

Transmuter was the [quest nemesis](/wiki/Quest_nemesis "Quest nemesis") for the defunct [Doppelganger quest](/wiki/Doppelganger_quest "Doppelganger quest").
html:
Transmuter

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
This article is about SLASH'EM quest nemesis. For the SpliceHack monster, see Transmuter (SpliceHack).
@ Transmuter
Difficulty 25
Attacks Arcane spellcasting, arcane spellcasting, claw (steal quest artifact) 2d8, claw (steal quest artifact) 2d8, claw (steal quest artifact) 2d8, claw (steal quest artifact) 2d8
@ Transmuter
Difficulty 25
Attacks

Arcane spellcasting, arcane spellcasting, claw (steal quest artifact) 2d8, claw (steal quest artifact) 2d8, claw (steal quest artifact) 2d8, claw (steal quest artifact) 2d8

Speed 10
Base AC -10
Base MR 30
Alignment -20 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) Unique
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size Medium
Resistances Death, fire, cold, shock, poison
Resistances conveyed Fire (25%), cold (25%), shock (25%), poison (25%)

Transmuter:

  • can see invisible creatures.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • is nasty.
  • is strong.
  • likes gold.
  • likes gems.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • wants your quest artifact.
  • hits creatures as a +4 weapon.

Transmuter was the quest nemesis for the defunct Doppelganger quest.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Transmuter&oldid=145711"
